Views.​ADC_RULE_GROUP_STATUS

Wrapper view around the apex collection containing the list of mandatory items

Fields
cgs_cgr_id

CGR_ID of the mandatory items list

cgs_id

Collection PK (SEQ_ID)

cgs_cpi_id

ID of the page item

cgs_cpi_label

Label of the page item

cgs_cpi_mandatory_message

Message to display if the page item violates the mandatory rule
